messages.content:
Can you summarize the following points of next steps into 7 points or less and make it so they follow each other in a logical succession?
Update / advance framework.  
Develop alternative funding sources for businesses that don't fit into the VC model.  
Update / advance framework.  
Replicator - identify projects that work and help teams "franchise" them to develop skills and solve problems systematically  
Enliven the community of practice / Open community.  
Funding models loan/investment  
Develop new program formats: shorter, less intensive, more intensive, etc.  
Identify jobs that should not be automated, help people expand those types of jobs.  
Improve per-post measurement in implementation (getting the data) and data gathering and processing.  (case studies)  
Develop a systematic learning and development cycle (to learn from program iterations)  
Develop financial stability for Bloom to continue to research/explore methods to unlock human potential for positive change.

1. Update/advance framework.
2. Develop alternative funding sources for businesses that don't fit into the VC model.
3. Replicator - Identify projects that work and help teams "franchise" them to develop skills and solve problems systematically.
4. Enliven the community of practice/Open community.
5. Develop new program formats: shorter, less intensive, more intensive, etc.
6. Identify jobs that should not be automated, help people expand those types of jobs.
7. Improve per-post measurement in implementation and data gathering and processing.

Note: The point regarding "Funding models loan/investment" is not included in the summary as it seems to be overlapping with point 2 and can be inferred from it.
